#summary Get the access token of a user who has authorized you to access their feed

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_trusted_partner


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||jabberId||string||Jabber ID for the user who is attempting to retrieve the token.||
|| ||password||string||MD5 hashed password for the user who is attempting to retrieve the token.||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||400||TBException_InvalidInput||Partner Key does not exist.||
||401||InvalidUserAuthException||Incorrect user credentials.||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <success type="login">
          <accessToken partner_key="###" jabberId="######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com">akdlfj09ucv098uadsfk3db36fy60kc8962</accessToken>
          <userid>######</userid>
          <firstname>Api</firstname>
          <lastname>User</lastname>
          <username>ApiUser3</username>
     </success>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/auth/getAccessToken</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="###"/>
     <timer startTime="1217972287.4674" execTime="16.432046890259"/>
</tokResult>
}}}

==Notes==
  * The developer must sign this with their {PARTNER_SECRET}
